short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shopping Music while you browse Amazon

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Buy Mode allows you to recreate the shopping experience of your favorite simulated games. Simply click on the app icon and it will play music from a playlist that can be customized with links from YouTube and open a link to Amazon.com to stimulate your shopping experience.
